preqs: Students must have completed 72 credit points, including AFC2120 or ACC2120.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0169, 0179}
(Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC2120, AFC2120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} AND  Must have passed 72 (I/W) credit points)

description: Over the 12 week period of full-time employment, students will be required to complete one or more specified projects. The projects will be determined by the course coordinator in consultation with the sponsor and the student undergoing the industry-based learning.
